description: Calvin is our first contestant on the MSKB Trivia Quiz. The rules are simple: Watch, Guess, Strip & Wank. The model watches a Maskurbate clip, then must answer a question related to this clip. A good answer is worth $100. If the answer is incorrect, the model must take a piece of clothing off. When totally naked, the model must jerkoff and cum, while watching our clips. Not easy for straight guys! Hope you'll enjoy this new Maskurbate series!
title: MSKB Trivia Quiz - Calvin, Scene #01
